Combating Fraud Activities using Data Science

11th January 2020, IIIT Delhi

The Workshop on Combating Fraud Activities using Data Science (Co-FAD) is a one-day colloquium studying the impact of fraudulent activities in Social Science, Journalism, Product Reviews, Forged Imagery, Cybercrime, and Finance. It will host some of the most influential people whose research is helping curb fake activities around the web.

It is being organized by the Laboratory for Computational Social Systems (LCS2) at IIIT Delhi.

A007, R&D Block, IIIT Delhi
Okhla Industrial Estate, Phase III
Near Govind Puri Metro Station
New Delhi, Delhi 110020
